title: A memo calls problems within Gainesville's finance department "Extreme" - mycbs4.com
content: A memo calls problems within Gainesville's finance department "Extreme"  mycbs4.com
description: Today, City of Gainesville commissioners voted 6 to 1 vote to continue the discussion of the city's finance's. "We have all met, we have had a public meeting, accept it and move on, and we will have our regularly and quarterly updates on the situation on progress," Commissioner Reina Saco said.  The letter raises serious concerns about the state of the city's finance department and ability to accurately report financial statement.
